title: Turkish aubergine and yogurt dip
ingredients: ['3 aubergines, about 675 g (1½ lb) in total', '2 large garlic cloves', '30 g (1 oz) ground almonds', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '150 g (5½ oz) Greek-style yogurt', '50 g (1¾ oz) stoned black olives, roughly chopped', 'salt and pepper', 'To serve', '3 courgettes', '3 celery sticks', '½ cauliflower, broken into large florets', '8 wholemeal pitta breads', 'To garnish', '¼ tsp paprika', '4 black olives, halved and stoned']
